delimiter_settings="delimiter_style:solid|delimiter_width:0|delimiter_height:1" undefined="" title_font_options="tag:h2|color:%23000000|font_style_bold:1" subtitle_font_options="tag:h5|color:%23000000|font_style_bold:1"]

The Best Gift You Can Give:

Getting the Details of Life Organized for You and Your Loved Ones

[/dfd_heading][dfd_spacer screen_wide_spacer_size="20" screen_normal_resolution="1024" screen_tablet_resolution="800" screen_mobile_resolution="480" screen_normal_spacer_size="15" screen_tablet_spacer_size="15" screen_mobile_spacer_size="10"][vc_column_text]There are many complex areas of our busy lives that need daily attention and coordination, but often get neglected due to limited time and energy. Having your affairs in good order is the best gift you can give to your family and beneficiaries.  And can save them a lot of time, money and sorrow.  Professional fiduciaries can assist individuals at all stages of life to help reduce stress and navigate life more smoothly.  Learn:[/vc_column_text][dfd_spacer screen_wide_spacer_size="20" screen_normal_resolution="1024" screen_tablet_resolution="800" screen_mobile_resolution="480" screen_normal_spacer_size="15" screen_tablet_spacer_size="15" screen_mobile_spacer_size="10"][dfd_icon_list module_animation="transition.slideRightBigIn" list_fields="%5B%7B%22icon_type%22%3A%22selector%22%2C%22select_icon%22%3A%22dfd_icons%22%2C%22ic_dfd_icons%22%3A%22dfd-socicon-arrow-right%22%2C%22text_content%22%3A%22Why%20Having%20a%20Plan%20is%20So%20Important%22%7D%2C%7B%22icon_type%22%3A%22selector%22%2C%22select_icon%22%3A%22dfd_icons%22%2C%22ic_dfd_icons%22%3A%22dfd-socicon-arrow-right%22%2C%22text_content%22%3A%22How%20to%20Get%20Started%22%7D%2C%7B%22icon_type%22%3A%22selector%22%2C%22select_icon%22%3A%22dfd_icons%22%2C%22ic_dfd_icons%22%3A%22dfd-socicon-arrow-right%22%2C%22text_content%22%3A%22The%20Benefits%20of%20Working%20with%20a%20Professional%20Fiduciary%22%7D%5D" main_style="style-1" icon_size="20" icon_color="#45c168" icon_background="#ffffff" font_options="tag:h6|color:%2345c168"][dfd_spacer screen_wide_spacer_size="20" screen_normal_resolution="1024" screen_tablet_resolution="800" screen_mobile_resolution="480" screen_normal_spacer_size="15" screen_tablet_spacer_size="15" screen_mobile_spacer_size="10"][vc_column_text]Victoria Rizo is a California Licensed Professional Fiduciary.  She is an alumna of the University of Southern California, a member of the Professional Fiduciary Association of California, a member of the Senior Specialist Group for the Foundation for Senior Services, and a member the Los Angeles Estate Planning Council.  Email:  Victoria@LifeBridgeSolutions.com  Phone:  323.509.3933[/vc_column_text][dfd_spacer screen_wide_spacer_size="20" screen_normal_resolution="1024" screen_tablet_resolution="800" screen_mobile_resolution="480" screen_normal_spacer_size="15" screen_tablet_spacer_size="15" screen_mobile_spacer_size="10"][vc_separator][dfd_spacer screen_wide_spacer_size="20" screen_normal_resolution="1024" screen_tablet_resolution="800" screen_mobile_resolution="480" screen_normal_spacer_size="15" screen_tablet_spacer_size="15" screen_mobile_spacer_size="10"][dfd_heading subtitle="Nancy Spear" delimiter_settings="delimiter_style:solid|delimiter_width:0|delimiter_height:1" undefined="" title_font_options="tag:h2|color:%23000000|font_style_bold:1" subtitle_font_options="tag:h5|color:%23000000|font_style_bold:1"]Stories You’ve Never Told Me: Using Zoom, Google Maps, YouTube, and More[/dfd_heading][dfd_spacer screen_wide_spacer_size="20" screen_normal_resolution="1024" screen_tablet_resolution="800" screen_mobile_resolution="480" screen_normal_spacer_size="15" screen_tablet_spacer_size="15" screen_mobile_spacer_size="10"][vc_column_text]Nancy Spear is the founder/owner of Nancy’s Tech Help for Older Adults.  Do you have stories that you want to share with your children and grandchildren?  Do you have parents, aunts and uncles that have stories that you want them to share?  Do it now, before it is too late.  Nancy will show us how to unleash the stories you’ve never heard from your family by using:[/vc_column_text][dfd_spacer screen_wide_spacer_size="20" screen_normal_resolution="1024" screen_tablet_resolution="800" screen_mobile_resolution="480" screen_normal_spacer_size="15" screen_tablet_spacer_size="15" screen_mobile_spacer_size="10"][dfd_icon_list module_animation="transition.slideRightBigIn" list_fields="%5B%7B%22icon_type%22%3A%22selector%22%2C%22select_icon%22%3A%22dfd_icons%22%2C%22ic_dfd_icons%22%3A%22dfd-socicon-arrow-right%22%2C%22text_content%22%3A%22Zoom%22%7D%2C%7B%22icon_type%22%3A%22selector%22%2C%22select_icon%22%3A%22dfd_icons%22%2C%22ic_dfd_icons%22%3A%22dfd-socicon-arrow-right%22%2C%22text_content%22%3A%22Google%20Maps%20and%20Images%22%7D%2C%7B%22icon_type%22%3A%22selector%22%2C%22select_icon%22%3A%22dfd_icons%22%2C%22ic_dfd_icons%22%3A%22dfd-socicon-arrow-right%22%2C%22text_content%22%3A%22Old%20Photos%20and%20Film%22%7D%2C%7B%22icon_type%22%3A%22selector%22%2C%22select_icon%22%3A%22dfd_icons%22%2C%22ic_dfd_icons%22%3A%22dfd-socicon-arrow-right%22%2C%22text_content%22%3A%22And%20YouTube%22%7D%5D" main_style="style-1" icon_size="20" icon_color="#45c168" icon_background="#ffffff" font_options="tag:h6|color:%2345c168"][dfd_spacer screen_wide_spacer_size="20" screen_normal_resolution="1024" screen_tablet_resolution="800" screen_mobile_resolution="480" screen_normal_spacer_size="15" screen_tablet_spacer_size="15" screen_mobile_spacer_size="10"][vc_column_text]Nancy started Nancy’s Tech Help for Older Adults six years ago after realizing her parents needed a patient tech teacher. She’s taught her clients, in their 70s, 80s, and 90s, everything from texting, emailing, online shopping, and even iMovie. Now, during the pandemic, they are learning Zoom, how to recognize fraudulent emails, and how to order groceries. Email:  info@nancys-tech-help.com  Phone:  310.365.9951[/vc_column_text][dfd_spacer screen_wide_spacer_size="40" screen_normal_resolution="1024" screen_tablet_resolution="800" screen_mobile_resolution="480" screen_normal_spacer_size="30" screen_tablet_spacer_size="20" screen_mobile_spacer_size="15"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_separator color="blue"][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][dfd_spacer screen_wide_spacer_size="40" screen_normal_resolution="1024" screen_tablet_resolution="800" screen_mobile_resolution="480" screen_normal_spacer_size="30" screen_tablet_spacer_size="20" screen_mobile_spacer_size="15"][vc_column_text css=".vc_custom_1615158890084{background-color: #d6f9f2 !important;}"]AAII Chapter Webinar is inviting you to a scheduled Zoom meeting. Topic: AAII Retirement Group Zoom Meeting 3-13-2021 Time: Mar 13, 2021 10:00 AM Pacific Time (US and Canada) Join Zoom Meeting https://us02web.zoom.us/j/87183783939?pwd=VE5BRFBVY3hWdkowNGxhaGdHRDZPQT09 Meeting ID: 871 8378 3939 Passcode: 974791 One tap mobile +16699006833,,87183783939#,,,,*974791# US (San Jose) +13462487799,,87183783939#,,,,*974791# US (Houston) Dial by your location +1 669 900 6833 US (San Jose) +1 346 248 7799 US (Houston) +1 253 215 8782 US (Tacoma) +1 301 715 8592 US (Washington DC) +1 312 626 6799 US (Chicago) +1 929 205 6099 US (New York) Meeting ID: 871 8378 3939 Passcode: 974791 The American Association of Individual Investors is an independent, nonprofit corporation formed for the purpose of assisting individuals in becoming effective managers of their own assets through programs of education, information and research.[/vc_column_text][dfd_spacer screen_wide_spacer_size="40" screen_normal_resolution="1024" screen_tablet_resolution="800" screen_mobile_resolution="480" screen_normal_spacer_size="30" screen_tablet_spacer_size="20" screen_mobile_spacer_size="15"][/vc_column][/vc_row]
item.excerpt:encoded: Financial Education meeting information that focuses on the broad overview of basic individual investing in today's market.
